For all non-english users here is the solution to lvl gateway crash and orcs spawning behind door.

Change your system settings.

Control Panel -> Region and Language -> Administrative -> Change system local -> English(United States), then reboot your computer, done.

Game will no longer crash on level GATEWAY; Orcs will break through the door on level THE BALCONY; Orcs will not spawn at wrong position on level THE BRIDGE.

Note your non-unicode softwares may not show your region characters properly.

These bugs are probably caused by wrong character encoding of some .onslaught files in datademo.zip.
